params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.database
params.description: Required. The database name. In the format: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}.

params.name: data.documents
params.description: The names of the documents to retrieve. In the format: projects/{project_id}/databases/{database_id}/documents/{document_path}. The request will fail if any of the document is not a child resource of the given database. Duplicate names will be elided.

params.name: data.mask
params.description: The fields to return. If not set, returns all fields. If a document has a field that is not present in this mask, that field will not be returned in the response.

params.name: data.new_transaction
params.description: Starts a new transaction and reads the documents. Defaults to a read-only transaction. The new transaction ID will be returned as the first response in the stream.

params.name: data.read_time
params.description: Reads documents as they were at the given time. This may not be older than 270 seconds.
